publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4793 Malcolm Chisholm: Shelter Scotland Report—That the Parliament welcomes the report, Building solutions, prepared by Shelter Scotland, in which the benefits of investing in affordable homes are set out; specifically acknowledges the benefits for education, health and community cohesion of more and better homes, and recognises the importance of publicly funded housing programmes in sustaining employment in the construction sector at a time when private housing output has dramatically declined.

S3M-4793 Shelter Scotland Report (lodged on 7 September 2009) Sandra White*, Bill Kidd*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Kenneth Gibson*, John Park*, Ian McKee*, Mary Mulligan*, Patrick Harvie*, Jackie Baillie*, Christine Grahame*, Mike Pringle*, Christina McKelvie*

S3M-4793 Shelter Scotland Report (lodged on 7 September 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Elaine Murray*, James Kelly*, Robin Harper*, Robert Brown*, Trish Godman*, Liam McArthur*, Hugh Henry*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Cathie Craigie*
S3M-4793 Shelter Scotland Report (lodged on 7 September 2009) Angela Constance*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-4793 Malcolm Chisholm: Shelter Scotland Report—That the Parliament welcomes the report, Building solutions, prepared by Shelter Scotland, in which the benefits of investing in affordable homes are set out; specifically acknowledges the benefits for education, health and community cohesion of more and better homes, and recognises the importance of publicly funded housing programmes in sustaining employment in the construction sector at a time when private housing output has dramatically declined. Supported by: Sandra White, Bill Kidd, Hugh O’Donnell, Kenneth Gibson, John Park, Ian McKee, Mary Mulligan, Patrick Harvie, Jackie Baillie, Christine Grahame, Mike Pringle, Christina McKelvie, Jamie Hepburn, Elaine Murray, James Kelly, Robin Harper, Robert Brown, Trish Godman, Liam McArthur, Hugh Henry, Marilyn Livingstone, Cathie Craigie, Angela Constance, Gil Paterson, Marlyn Glen*
S3M-4793 Shelter Scotland Report (lodged on 7 September 2009) Karen Whitefield*, Alison McInnes*, Bill Wilson*, Ken Macintosh*
S3M-4793 Shelter Scotland Report (lodged on 7 September 2009) Stewart Maxwell*
S3M-4793 Shelter Scotland Report (lodged on 7 September 2009) Elaine Smith*, Johann Lamont*, George Foulkes*
S3M-4793 Shelter Scotland Report (lodged on 7 September 2009) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-4793 Shelter Scotland Report (lodged on 7 September 2009) Cathy Peattie*, Rhoda Grant*, David Stewart*
S3M-4793 Shelter Scotland Report (lodged on 7 September 2009) Pauline McNeill*
S3M-4793 Shelter Scotland Report (lodged on 7 September 2009) Richard Baker*
